name: FCL_EXTRNL_CDE_LST
description: The list value database (FCL) stores information about data as defined by external specifications, for example NCPDP claim adjudication. This table stores information about those list values.

columns.name: EXT_CODE_LST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the list/value record.

columns.name: EXT_CODE_LST_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.
